EmailTemplate.name: Hospitality EOI Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Update: Marriott Hotels Career Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Calling all school leavers!
Marriott Hotels is now hiring for the next generation of hospitality professionals!
We recently sent you an email about an exciting career opportunity with Marriott Hotels. Unfortunately, we experienced some technical issues so weren't able to capture your interest.
What next?
Take 15 minutes to start your journey today by applying on our website using your login details below.
www.stepforward.uk.com
Email: {!Contact.Email}
Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
If this is your first time logging in you will need to use your pin.
Pin: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
You must then also make sure to register your interest in the Hospitality pathway separately using the link below.
{!Step_Forward_Activity__c.TEMP_Link_to_Hospitality_Pathway_Form__c}
Our next assessments are happening soon so take the first step to securing your future now.
Remind me again, what could I be doing?
As a Marriott Apprentice, your first year will be fully supported with training and guidance from Step Forward, a unique school leavers’ programme brought to you by The Challenge. You then have the opportunity to continue with Marriott on an apprenticeship with a difference.
Join us and we’ll support you to reach your full potential. Bring us your passion and determination to succeed and we’ll show you a world of opportunity that reaches every corner of the globe.
Year One
Receive world class training on the job and move into a supervisory role.
Year Two
Possibility to secure full-time employment, earn up to £15,000 and accelerate your career path.
Year Three
Potential to secure a job anywhere in the world in a Marriott Hotel
www.stepforward.uk.com
